title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.213 - Payroll distribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.213 - Payroll distribution

State Regulations
(a) An
analysis of the total amount of salaries and wages paid or accrued for a
period, showing the component amounts to be charged to the various departments, operations, activities or products affected. (b) The entry by which the amount of salaries
and wages paid or accrued for a period is charged in the required detail to the
accounts or records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.213

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
